title: Client restoring to older version
body: If my internet goes off while I'm in the client, not in game, and i turn off my pc, when i next launch the client it restores to an older version every time. Does anyone know why this is happening and a way to fix it? its not a big problem its just annoying

replies.body:
Hey there,

I've seen this happen a few times, but am personally unsure of the cause. I believe the "old ui" you see is a type of fallback for the client in the event of any issues.

Repairing the client will help to resolve this issue and you should not experience this if you use the Alpha client (I believe)
